mapper.sql: adv_id, adv_title, adv_pic_url, adv_offline, adv_order, adv_link_url, adv_cratetime, adv_updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into advertisement (adv_id, adv_title, adv_pic_url, adv_offline, adv_order, adv_link_url, adv_cratetime, adv_updatetime) values (#{advId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advOffline,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{advOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advLinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advCratetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{advUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into advertisement
adv_id,
adv_title,
adv_pic_url,
adv_offline,
adv_order,
adv_link_url,
adv_cratetime,
adv_updatetime,

mapper.update:
update advertisement
adv_title = #{advTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adv_pic_url = #{advPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adv_offline = #{advOffline,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
adv_order = #{advOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adv_link_url = #{advLinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adv_cratetime = #{advCratetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
adv_updatetime = #{advUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where adv_id = #{advId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update advertisement set adv_title = #{advTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adv_pic_url = #{advPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adv_offline = #{advOffline,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, adv_order = #{advOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adv_link_url = #{advLinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adv_cratetime = #{advCratetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adv_updatetime = #{advUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where adv_id = #{advId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM advertisement WHERE ${propertyName} like Concat('%',#{propertyValue},'%')
SELECT * FROM advertisement WHERE adv_cratetime>=#{startTime} AND #{endTime}>=adv_cratetime
